sentences.en: ‘Suit yourself,’ he said with a shrug.
sentences.cn: “随你的便。”他耸耸肩说道。

sentences.en: "I suppose so," said Anna with a shrug.
sentences.cn: “我想是吧,”安娜耸了耸肩说道.

sentences.en: Coralie cried, with a shrug of her robust shoulders.
sentences.cn: 柯拉丽耸了耸丰满的肩膀,大叫起来.

sentences.en: Don't just shrug your shoulders . Say something.

sentences.en: Erica made a little deprecating shrug.
sentences.cn: 埃丽卡有点不以为然地耸耸肩。

sentences.en: He gave a fatalistic shrug. " Bad luck , " he said to Hagen.
sentences.cn: 他显得有点无可奈何的样子,耸 耸肩.

sentences.en: He gave a feeble shrug and tried to squirm free.
sentences.cn: 他无力地耸耸肩，扭动身体想要挣脱。

sentences.en: He gave a self-deprecating shrug.

sentences.en: He shrug his low opinion of the occupant of the room.
sentences.cn: 他耸耸肩表示对那房间的住户不屑一顾。

sentences.en: I admire the way she is able to shrug off unfair criticism.
sentences.cn: 我很佩服她能对错误的批评意见不予理会.

sentences.en: I can leave with a cheerful shrug and never look back.
sentences.cn: 我现在可以高高兴兴地扔下,毫不痛惜.

sentences.en: I just shrugged my shoulders and ignored him.
sentences.cn: 我只是耸耸肩，没有理睬他。

sentences.en: I would answer with a shrug of my shoulders.
sentences.cn: 我总是耸耸肩回答.

sentences.en: Melanie shrugged and walked away.
sentences.cn: 梅拉妮耸耸肩走开了。

sentences.en: She can shrug off her troubles and keep smiling.
sentences.cn: 她能够把烦恼置之度外而依旧保持笑容.

sentences.en: She gave a shrug of her shoulders.
sentences.cn: 她耸了耸肩膀.

sentences.en: shrug off a burden.

sentences.en: With a shrug, he went out of the room.
